async sign_in(login, password) → bool

Logging in to the account.

Parameters

  • login (str) – user’s login

  • password (str) – user’s password

Raises

exceptions.WrongCredentials – If credentials are invalid

Returns

True if the account was successfully logged in

Return type

bool

async submit_record(level: str, progress: int, video: str, note: str) → client.Response

Sending a record.

Parameters

  • note (str) – Additional notes you’d like to pass on to the list moderator receiving your submission

  • video (str) – Video confirming the legitimacy of your record

  • progress (int) – The progress made as percentage

  • level (str) – The name of level on which record was set

Raises

exceptions.NotLoggedIn – If user wasn’t logged in

Returns

Response from the site

Return type

Response

async add_level_main(name: str, level_id: int, length_minutes: int, length_seconds: int, objects: int, version: str, verifier: str, holder: str, creator: str, video: str, song_link: str, score: int, min_percent: int, preview: object, password: str = '', description: str = '') → client.Response

Adding a level to the main list.

Parameters

  • description (str) – Optional Description of the level

  • video (str) – Verification video

  • level_id (int) – Id of the level

  • name (str) – Name of the level

  • length_minutes (int) – Length of the level in minutes

  • length_seconds (int) – Seconds

  • objects (int) – Quantity of objects

  • version (str) – The version in which the level was created

  • verifier (str) – Verifier of the level

  • holder (str) – Holder of the level

  • creator (str) – Creator of the level

  • song_link (str) – Link to the song

  • score (int) – Quantity of points given for passing

  • min_percent (int) – Minimum percentage for inclusion in the list

  • preview (object) – Image preview file

  • password (str) – Optional password to copy the level

Raises

exceptions.NotLoggedIn – If user wasn’t logged in

Returns

Response from the site

Return type

Response
